complaint_text: The road near MG Road is full of potholes.

There is a deep crack in the main highway surface.
My morning bus never arrives on time.

Garbage dumped on footpath beside the road.

Traffic lights are flickering randomly at Koramangala.
Manhole uncovered near Shivajinagar bus stand.
Street flooded after light rain due to clogged drains.
Bus 365 never arrives before 9 AM on weekdays.
Too much dust from unpaved road in Whitefield.
